videoLibrary.title: Video Library
videoLibrary.downloadFirstVideo: Download your first video to get started

videoPlayer.formatNotSupported: The video format may not be supported or the file may be corrupted.
videoPlayer.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

videoInput.title: Paste and Collect
videoInput.subtitle: Paste a video URL and choose your preferred quality
videoInput.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid video URL from supported platforms (YouTube, Vimeo, etc.)
videoInput.noFormats: No video formats available for this URL

cookie.title: Cookie Management
cookie.description: Update browser cookies to improve video download success rate
cookie.updateError: Cookie update failed, please try again
cookie.note: Click the button to get cookies from current browser and update to server

info.title: About Cookie Configuration
info.point1: Cookies are used to access video content that requires login
info.point2: Regular cookie updates can prevent download failures
info.point3: Cookie data is only stored on the local server
